x/embed/makefile - ngnksource

  1. 0:a makefile
  2.     LD_LIBRARY_PATH=../.. ./a
  3. a:../../libk.so a.c makefile
  4.     $(CC) -L../.. -lk a.c -o a

  6. liba.so:a.c makefile
  7.     $(CC) -L../.. a.c -o liba.so -g -march=native -Dlibc -fPIC -Dshared -undefined -shared

  9. ../../libk.so:../../*.c ../../*.h
  10.     $(MAKE) -C../.. libk.so
